EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - STARTING IN 30 MINUTES: Coffee With Kelly - Billing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Coffee with Kelly - Billing REMINDER: Starting in 30 Minutes! Reminder: your Coffee with Kelly - Webinar starts in 30 minutes! We'll be discussing "Dangers of Single Print"
Don't miss out on this month's tips for your Respond Billing or TriTech.com Billing software. DATE: Every Second Tuesday of the Month TIME: 11:30 AM ET l 10:30 AM CT l 9:30 AM MT l 8:30 AM PT PRESENTER: Kelly Wachal - TriTech Supervisor of Customer Service and Education AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
See you online! WEBINAR DETAILS JOIN LINK:
{{member.webinar url:default=URL}} Questions? Contact: Cheri Lane, Marketing Communication Manager 563-387-4858 | cheri.lane@tritech.com <mailto:cheri.lane@tritech.com>
